name: Deathless (FatiguedFox, Minty)
description:
Deathless is TheMinty's and Myself's first Game Jam game (and Game in general.)  This is our submission for the Retro8Bit Game Jam.

You play as this little, blue, human-like organism  who has woken up in a room surround by brick walls. It quickly becomes apparent that escaping would be an impossible feat via normal means. But the idea of a permanent death is foreign to you.

There are five levels in total (excluding extra rooms with little significance), all which rank up in difficulty relatively quickly...

Use your ability to cheat death and escape the unfamiliar facility.

Remember, Death Is Never The End!

- Windows is guaranteed to work, but I have no way of testing if its suitable for Linux.  

- Press "CONTROL + F" to Toggle Fullscreen Off and On.
